name: Essence of Bashing
description: Used to create items that are orientated around bashing.

name: Essence of Bacon
description: Used to create items that are orientated around bacon.

name: Essence of Cutting
description: Used to create items that are orientated around cutting.

name: Plutonium Scale
description: A scale droppped from the LVL: 20 Plutonium Dragon! How the heck did you go this? You cheated, didn't you?

name: Shadow Bacon
description: This is no ordinary bacon, this is SHADOW bacon! A rare delicacy, almost unheard of. It looks so amazing you feel unworthy being in it's presence, much less eating it. So instead, you can honor this fabled bacon by turning into freaking awesome gear! Either that or just sit it to collect dust on a shelf in you bunker. That would work too.

name: Essence of Power
description: The ULTIMATE essence! Used to create by far the most powerful gear! You are either a god or cheated by obtaining this legendary item!
